Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 55th overall pick, by Cleveland in 1988...
Injured on 7/17/1990 with a Bruised Ribs, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/9/1991 with a Fractured Nose, out for 5 days...
Had first career hit (double) on 7/8/1992, off Paul Hartzell (BOS)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/7/1993, off Gary Wayne (MIN)...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Baltimore on 8/16/1994...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/1996, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Was selected to the 1996 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/19/1997, hitting .400 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
